publicationStmt.publisher: Uppsala University, Department of linguistics and philology

msContents.summary: Translations of Biblical texts into North-Western Karaim: The Latter Prophets, The Twelve Minor Prophets, the Sifrei Emet (Psalms, Proverbs, Job), and the Five Megillot (Song of Songs, Ruth, Lamentations, Ecclesiastes, Esther)

ab.title: Jeremiah 45
ab.l: Ol śoź ki śoźĺadi Jirmijahu ol navi Baruḫḫa uvluna Ńerijanyn jazɣanynda ol śoźĺarni bitik üśt́uńa śo- źuńd́ań Jirmijahunun ol d́ort́uńč́u jylda Johojaqimǵa uvluna Jošijahunun bijiniń Juhudanyn ajtadoɣoč.
Bolej ajtty H T́eńrisi Jis- raʾeĺniń śeniń üč́uń Baruḫ.
Ajttyj vaj ėńdi maja ki arttyrdy H qajɣy siźĺavim üśt́uńa jazdym kistunmaɣym byla da tynčlyḥ tapmadym.
Bolej ajtḥyn anar bolej ajtty H muna ńeki qondar- dym any buzarmyn da ńe ki ornattym ḿeń tašlarmyn da bar ol jer ḿenim ol.

Da śeń iźĺejsiń öźuja ullu navilikĺar iźĺaḿagiń alarny ki muna ḿeń keĺtirirmiń jamanlyḥ bar t́eń üśt́uńa alej ajtty H da b́erirmiń saja ǯanyjny olǯaɣa bar ol orunlar üśt́uńa ki üŕuśejiź anda.
